Had dinner here tonight with co-workers.  English menu provided.  Restaurant is gorgeous!   Service was prompt and efficient.  We had Iberia ham, toasts with tomato jam, fried artichokes, amazing cheese risotto (yum!) for small plates.  Then dinner was monkfish and salmon.  We shared a bottle of red wine, total bill ~140 euros for three.  This restaurant is located in a great area on the beach and near nightclubs.  Taxis frequent this area, so easy to find a ride back to hotel.  Definitely recommend.
